We are thrilled to invite you to an exciting day filled with a variety of stimulating activities, thought-provoking discussions, and hands-on experiences designed to spark curiosity and creativity. Here's a sneak peek at what we have planned for you:

# Magazine Launch

Celebrate the unveiling of the Sharodiya Sonkhaa, a unique bilingual magazine exploring astronomy, astrophysics, and culture.

# Olympiad Training & Problem-Solving Session

Expert-led sessions to guide students on Math, Physics, and Informatics Olympiads, alongside ISI-CMI, TIFR, and NBHM preparation tips.

# Special Lecture by Esteemed Professor Barun Dutta

A captivating introduction to the General Theory of Relativity, starting from the basics and exploring the mathematical foundations.

# Collaborations

In partnership with Cheenta Academy, featuring leading educators and problem solvers.
